settings.title: About The Company
settings.subtitle: If you own a home swimming pool, this is the AI lifeguard that you need.
settings.text: Our SOSense technology is the ultimate swimming pool entry detection technology that has been made to keep your family safe.
settings.text_bottom: You can never know what the future holds, but you can take decisive action in order to prevent accidents from happening.

settings.title: Why choose SOSense
settings.subtitle: More than 350 children under the age of five
settings.text: Unfortunately pass away every year due to accidental drowning in pools nationwide. Knowing this statistic, pool safety alarms should be mandatory.

settings.title: When You Can Purchase SOSense
settings.subtitle: The BETA product is now available for early bird backers.
settings.text: This enables us to further develop our life-saving pool alarm system and you will gain the final product free of charge as soon as it is released.

settings.title: Who SOSense Is For
settings.subtitle: If you're a pool owner...
settings.text: It's important to take responsibility for your home space, to make it a safe space. Our SOSense swimming pool entry detection alarm has a detection range of up to 20 x 40 foot.

settings.title: How You Can Get Your SOSense
settings.subtitle: Purchasing: The BETA product is now available for early bird backers.
